alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 9:22PM CDT until April 15 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MISSISSIPPI COUNTY... At 922 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Keiser, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Osceola, Manila, Caraway, Keiser, Dell, Little River, Etowah, Victoria, Three Way, Jolliff Store, Dearman, West Ridge, Eastview, Lennie, Vail, Big Lake, Hightower, Carmi, Carson Lake and Whisp. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for eastern Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
